thread.title: "I Don't Remember Half Of The Things Kangana Said," Says Shahid About Her Comments On His Behaviour During Rangoon
thread.title_full: "I Don't Remember Half Of The Things Kangana Said," Says Shahid About Her Comments On His Behaviour During Rangoon

title: "I Don't Remember Half Of The Things Kangana Said," Says Shahid About Her Comments On His Behaviour During Rangoon
text:
facebook 
The upcoming film, Rangoon , has kept its crew on their toes. The filmmakers and actors have worked hard for the film, including travelling to and staying in remote locations were basic needs were hard to meet. On one such occasion, Kangana and Shahid were respectively sharing cottages with their team members. About the experience, Kangana said in an interview, "We were shooting in a remote location where a little makeshift cottage was erected. Shahid and I were sharing our cottages with our respective teams. Every morning, I would wake up to this mad hip-hop music. And he would exercise listening to crazy trance and techno songs blasting from the speakers. I was fed up, and wanted to shift out. Sharing the cottage with Shahid was a nightmare!"In response to this, Shahid told Bollywoodlife , "She has a vivid imagination. I don't remember half of the things she said in that interview, so I choose not to comment."Let's see where this goes!
